description: Dave Boyle (Director/Co-Writer), Aik Karapetian (Writer/Director), Michael Lerman (Co-Writer), Pepe Serna (Actor), Roberts Vinovskis (Producer), Mye Hoang (Associate Producer)
synopsis: A Japanese crime novelist in San Francisco tries to unravel a real life murder mystery in this acclaimed neo-noir featuring Takashi Miike regular Kazuki Kitamura.
title: Man From Reno
